name: XCSourceTextRange
desc: A half-open range of text in a buffer you use to select text or specify the insertion point for new text.

items.name: init(start: XCSourceTextPosition, end: XCSourceTextPosition)
items.desc: Creates a new source text range defined by its starting and ending positions.

items.name: var start: XCSourceTextPosition
items.desc: The start position of the range.

items.name: var end: XCSourceTextPosition
items.desc: The end position of the range.
